metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14695 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in minion id validation in SaltStack Saltbefore 2016.3.8, 2016.11.x before 2016.11.8, and 2017.7.x before 2017.7.2allows remote minions with incorrect credentials to authenticate to amaster via a crafted minion ID.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because ofan incomplete fix for CVE-2017-12791.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
